scheme_name: Coir Vikas Yojana-Skill Upgradation and Mahila Coir Yojana
description: The Coir Vikas Yojana-Skill Upgradation and Mahila Coir Yojana, implemented by the Coir Board, provides training programs and subsidized equipment to women entrepreneurs in the coir industry to promote self-employment and entrepreneurship.

benefits.equipment_subsidy: 75% subsidy on coir machinery, up to Rs. 7.5 Lakhs
benefits.stipend: Monthly stipend during training, up to Rs. 3,000

business_criteria: Must intend to start or expand a coir-based enterprise
residency_criteria: Must be a resident of India

eligible_activities: Training in coir spinning, weaving, or product manufacturing

steps: Obtain the application form from the Coir Board or regional offices
Submit the application with a business plan
Attach required documents, including Aadhaar and residency proof
Applications are reviewed by the Coir Board
Approved candidates are enrolled in training and receive subsidies
application_process.note: Applicants must complete training to avail equipment subsidy

special_notes: Training is conducted at Coir Board centers
Equipment subsidy is linked to bank loans
Priority is given to women in coir-producing regions
